<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Fetches documents visibility"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/rest/api/v1/governance/documents/visibilityoverrides"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetches the visibility override status of the documents passed.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"docIds","in":"query","description":"List of doc-ids which will have their hide status fetched.","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The visibility status of documents","content":{"application/json; charset=UTF-8":{"schema":{"properties":{"visibilityOverrides":{"type":"array","items":{"properties":{"docId":{"type":"string"},"override":{"description":"The visibility-override state of the document.","type":"string","enum":["NONE","HIDE_FROM_ALL","HIDE_FROM_GROUPS","HIDE_FROM_ALL_EXCEPT_OWNER"]}},"title":"DocumentVisibilityOverride"}}},"title":"GetDocumentVisibilityOverridesResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Permissions error"},"500":{"description":"Internal error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
